TITLE Santa Fe Meatloaf
# Preheat oven to 350F.
{[Chopped Veg]
# Finely chop [1/2 cup [chopped] onion], [1/2 cup red bell pepper], and [4 cloves garlic]
}
# Saute $[Chopped Veg] until tender.
# Stir in [1 tsp chili powder], [1/2 tsp cumin],
# Stir in [1 tbl chipotle chile in adobo sauce] minced; saute 30 seconds. Remove from pan; cool.
# Combine sauted veg mixture, [1.5 lbs ground turkey breast], [3/4 cup breadcrumbs], [1/2 cup salsa], [1 tsp dried oregano], [1 item eggs] beaten in a large bowl.
# Place half of turkey mixture in an 8 x 4-inch loaf pan coated with cooking spray.
# Arrange [4 oz cheddar cheese] over top, leaving a 1/2-inch border around outside edges.
# Arrange remaining turkey mixture over cheese, pressing edges to pack.
# Spread [1/3 cup salsa] over top of meat loaf.
# Bake at 350F for 1 hour until a thermometer registers 155F.
# Let stand 10 minutes.
